column4:
いよいよ、古代遺跡に
分け入る時が来たぜ。
column5: All right, it's finally time to force our way through the ancient ruins.
column11: Finally, the time has come for us to force our way through the ancient ruins.

column4:
巨人だ！！？
本当にいたのかよ！
冗談だと思ってた！！
column5:
The giant!?!
It really exists!?
I thought you were joking!
column11:
The giant!!?
It really exists!?
I thought you were joking!!

column4:
電子装備がおかしくなってる！
古代遺跡には本当に、
不思議な力があるんだ！
column5: The electronic equipment is going nuts! The ancient ruins really do have bizarre powers!
column11: The electronic equipment is going nuts! The ancient ruins really do have bizarre powers!

column4:
最新式の人形は
使い物にならない。
旧式で出なおそう。
column5: Modern Puppets will be useless. Better use an old-fashioned one.
column11: Modern mechs will be useless. Let's use an old-fashioned one.
